title: Interpretation of a dream about dead people by Ibn Sirin and leading jurists

preview.html: The most accurate interpretation of a dream about dead people in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about dead people in a dream What are the most important indications of seeing a dead person according to Ibn Sirin and the scholars of jurisprudence? What is the meaning of seeing the dead being covered and washed? Does eating food from the dead have positive connotations? Since the symbol of the dead is full of meanings and interpretations, in this article you will find hundreds of clues about it. Do you have a confused dream? what are you waiting for; Google website Interpretation of dreams in Egypt Interpretation of a dream about the dead in a dream There are many visions about the dead and they are divided into several important visions that dreamers often see in their dreams, as follows: Seeing a dead person reciting the Qur’an: It indicates that the dead person enjoys Paradise and its bliss, and if he recites the Qur’an in a voice High in a dream, this indicates his high status and high position in Paradise. Seeing the dead eating fresh food: It is interpreted by the consolation of the dead person in his grave, his entry into Paradise, and God’s satisfaction with him for his good deeds that he continued to do throughout his life, and these situations made his good deeds many, so he was status. Among the believers and the righteous in Paradise. The dead are wearing new clothes and beautiful colors: This dream reassures the beholder that the dead has entered Paradise and his position is great there. There is no need for sadness or fear for him because he will enjoy Paradise and the good things that every believer desires. The dead are sitting in a large and beautiful house: This dream indicates To the food that comes to the dreamer and a new life comes to him in addition to the goodness and comfort that the deceased enjoys in Paradise. Seeing the dead person eating honey and giving it to the dreamer: It indicates that the deceased was a lover of the Holy Qur’an while he was alive, and therefore he became one of the people of Paradise, and if the dreamer eats From the honey from which the dead person ate, this is permissible. Money, a good marriage, and a life full of faith and religiosity, and perhaps the vision urges the dreamer to pay attention to the Qur’an and read it constantly. The dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing the sadness of the dead in a dream: It is interpreted either through the suffering of this dead man and his urgent need for help, supplication, and charity, or the scene shows many The sorrows, conflicts, and pain that the dreamer experiences, and he must not rebel against God’s judgment and be satisfied with it. And ask him for forgiveness and mercy. Seeing the laughter of the dead person and signs of happiness appearing on his face: It explains the comfort and happiness of the dead person in the afterlife, because God gave him a great position and made him enjoy Paradise, and perhaps the dream indicates happy days and happy times that the dreamer will soon experience. Dance of the dead in a dream: Ibn Sirin said That the dream is from Satan because the dead person does not dance, but some jurists said that the dancing of the dead person shows his bad deeds in this world, especially if the dead person is dancing while he is naked, but if the dreamer sees him dancing. Because of his happiness, this is the happiness and comfort that he enjoys from the divine. The deceased asked the dreamer for help: This dream indicates a serious distress that the deceased feels in his grave, and he wants the dreamer to help him lift this distress from him, and this help is either through supplication, reading the Qur’an, or abundant alms. Therefore.Interpretation of a dream about dead people in a single woman’s dream: Perhaps a single woman will see one of the visions

title: Interpretation of eyelids in a dream: Seeing eyelids in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Seeing an eyelid for an unmarried girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a married or unmarried man, white or black, falling illness, blood infection and more Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq and Al-Nabul Symbolizing eyelids in a dream Eyelid: If the eyelid turns out to be free of pain, this is something worthy of praise For everyone. The presence of this symbol in a dream is often interpreted by spouses, children, brothers, or partners, that is, everything that a person uses for protection and assistance in meeting his needs, reconciliation, and taking care of his health. Seeing an eyelid in a dream in good health and in one place indicates stability and security. As for the one who sees That the eyelids have pain, wounds, or little flesh, then these are sorrows and fears that the dreamer is experiencing. Eyelids in a dream may indicate your ability to protect yourself. Eyelids in a dream also indicate a close person who keeps your secrets. Sick eyelids show the love of the dreamer. And if the eye leads to money, then the eyelids are its fortress. The eyelid in a dream shows what the dreamer warns about weapons and everything that protects a person from harm, such as a teacher. Perhaps the eyelids in a dream mean brothers, sisters, husbands, children, the dead of the door, the chest, the closet, the veil, the guards, the children, the keeper of secrets, the guardians of trustworthiness, contentment, and anger. . Whoever sees a man’s eyelids hearing the sound of fate playing on his face shows his anger at him, otherwise he will learn of something that requires satisfaction. If the eyelids show two spouses, then the upper one is a male and the lower one is a female, and whatever protrusions or other things are born between them are evidence of the presence of a child, and tears are similar to sperm and what is in them. Whoever has poetry is evidence. Which they must defend from harm, so the beauty and purity of their eyelids is evidence of good condition, who the eyelids indicate. Perhaps their weakness is evidence of lack of holiness and lack of knowledge, and the closing of their eyelids may indicate leadership and abstaining from forbidden things. I likened eyelids to clouds and tears to rain, and eyelids show diseases. In a dream for the sake of love of opinion and love, and if the eye appears as money, then the eyelids are zakat and his share, as it is, peace be upon him. He said: (Fortify your wealth with zakat). Seeing eyelids in a dream YouTube

Interpretation of a dream about hugging my deceased grandmother in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my deceased grandmother’s breast in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s prayer for his grandmother, and God knows the unseen, as he can express his memory of his grandmother with supplication and charity, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When an unmarried girl sees her deceased grandmother’s breasts in a dream, this may indicate that On the good condition of her grandmother, and God knows the unseen. It may also refer to the inheritance that he enjoys from his grandmother and that God has all the knowledge. Interpretation of the dream of washing my dead grandmother in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of washing my dead grandmother in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing the dead being washed can lead to repentance, and God knows the unseen. It can also indicate cleansing from sins and disobedience, and God is All-Knowing. When the dreamer sees the dead being washed, this may indicate his willingness to bury one of the problems, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my deceased grandmother calling me in a dream may express freedom from stress, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of seeing Surat Yunus in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Surah Yunus in a dream or dream through the vision website roy2a.com. Surah Yunus is one of the surahs whose verses were revealed in Mecca and others in Medina. The entire surah is Meccan except verses 40, 94 and 96 are Medinan. The number of its verses is 109 verses. It is located in the eleventh part, and it was revealed after Surah Al-Isra, and the Surah talks about the stories of the prophets and the joys. Our Lord Yunus: Seeing Surat Yunus in a dream has many connotations and interpretations that we will explain today through this article from major dream interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing Surat Yunus in a dream. Seeing a reader of Surat Yunus in a dream is a sign of kindness and fulfillment of desires. Seeing Surat Yunus in a dream for a single woman is a sign. Her marriage to someone she wants and wants to marry. Watching the recitation of Surah Yunus for a married woman shows that she will get rid of worries and problems in her life. Listening to Surah Yunus in a dream indicates joy and death, anguish and depression for the pioneer. Surah Yunus in a dream indicates the salvation of conspirators and the envy of envious people. Reciting Surah Yunus in a dream indicates useful knowledge. Reciting Surah Yunus for patients in a dream is an indication of his future recovery, God willing. Imam Nabulsi says that seeing Surah Yunus in a dream is an indication of something that affects the fortuneteller’s money. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing Surat Nuh in a dream Interpretation of seeing Surat Yunus in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that he saw Surah Yunus in a dream is a sign of victory, goodness, knowledge, and liberation from all evil. Reciting Surat Yunus in a dream indicates the release of worries and anxiety and near happiness for the pioneer. Interpretation of seeing Surat Yunus in a dream for a single woman. Seeing Surah Yunus recited over an unmarried woman in a dream indicates that achieving dreams, wishes and successes in her life. Hearing Surah Yunus in a dream for an unmarried woman is an indication of her marriage to a person she pleases and wants and who is happy with this marriage. Repeatedly reciting Surah Yunus in a dream for a girl is a sign that she will get rid of the worries and sorrows that disturb her life. Seeing Surah Yunus in a dream for a girl is an indication of her connection to a young man of high social status. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Qadr in a dream. Interpretation of seeing Surat Yunus in a dream for a married woman. Watching the recitation of Surat Yunus for a married woman who is expected to share the good news about her pregnancy soon. Listening to Surat Yunus at home for a married woman is an indication of the end of disputes and problems between her and her husband. Reciting Surah Yunus in a dream for a married woman is an indication of her good worship and the good deeds that she performs. Interpretation of seeing Surah Yunus in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing Surah Yunus recited in a dream about a pregnant woman is an indication that she will get rid of the pregnancy problems she is suffering from and her pain and fatigue will soon disappear. Seeing Surat Yunus in a dream for a married woman is an indication Because of her fear and excessive thinking about her condition and the condition of her fetus. Reciting Surat Yunus for a pregnant woman is good news of an easy and smooth birth, God willing. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Shar in a dream. Interpretation of seeing Surat Yunus in a dream for a man.

title: What is the interpretation of dream number 30 for a single woman?

preview.html: The majority do not like the number 30 because they believe that it is an inauspicious number or that it has anything to do with the age of thirty, which young people do not like. In today's article from gptafser.com/ on your site, we will talk about different interpretations of this dream. Interpretation of seeing the number 30 in a dream for a single girl. Seeing the number 30 in a dream for a single girl is considered a symbol of constant thinking about age for the viewer. The vision also shows that the dreamer is thinking about the shape of her life and how She lives after thirty, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees the number thirty in her dream, it is a metaphor for her thinking about getting married before that age so that she does not miss the marriage train, and God knows best. The appearance of the number 30 in a dream for a single girl. It indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to many troubles and punishments in the future. Her life, and God knows best. Seeing the number 30 in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes the constant fear of old age and what life would be like without marriage, and God knows best. A single, engaged woman who dreams of the number 30 in her dream. A bad vision because it indicates the presence of obstacles that make her uncomfortable with her fiancé, and God knows best. I know. See also: Interpretation of seeing the number 30 in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a man. Interpretation of seeing the number 30 in a dream for a married woman. A married woman sees the number 30 in a dream. A sign of pregnancy soon, and God knows best. Seeing the number 30 in a married woman’s dream is a metaphor for maturity and wisdom. And the number 0 symbolizes To the beginning of a new era, and a sound path must be chosen in it, and God knows best. When a married woman sees the number thirty in a dream. This dream indicates that her married life with her husband is largely stable. Seeing the number 30 in a dream for a married woman. The dream indicates understanding And improving the financial situation of her husband and a very spacious living for them in a very short period of time. The appearance of the number 30 in a dream for a married woman in a dream. It is a metaphor for her extreme fear of children and her impatience that no harm befall them, and God knows best. The number 30 in a dream for a married woman who is going through a difficult time With her husband in a dream. Here the vision is better because it shows the resolution of these disputes and the end of sadness and worry, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the number 30 in a dream about the man and its meaning. The man who dreams of seeing the number 30 in a dream. A sign of certain things in his life that he needs for correctness and maturity. The appearance of the number Thirty in a man’s dream. This dream indicates that he is a rational person. He is balanced and very wise in achieving what he wants, and God knows best. To dream of the number 30 in a man’s dream indicates the love and respect that the viewer enjoys from people because of his role model, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of a vision The number 33 in a dream. The meaning of seeing the number 30 in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. A pregnant woman who sees the number 30 in her dream. Good skin for giving birth safely and securely and a good path to pregnancy. The appearance of the number 30 in a pregnant woman’s dream is a symbol of the three stages of pregnancy, and zero indicates life after childbirth, and God knows best. The interpretation of seeing the number 30 in a dream for young people and its meaning is for an unmarried young man when he dreams of the number 30 in a dream. It serves as a warning to him that age is passing and that he should think about marriage. Visions

title: Symbols that indicate the marriage of a divorced woman

preview.html: In our topic today from gptafser.com/ we will discuss the symbols of marriage in general and divorce in particular. Complete our topic until the end. Symbols of imminent marriage For the first time, dream interpretation scholars have explained that the appearance of some familiar symbols indicates the dreamer’s imminent marriage. Or it could indicate his marriage to a married man. Or a single person or a divorced woman. The vision may also indicate the proximity of the monarch, depending on his personality. Wearing jewelry, bracelets, and jewelry in a dream is considered one of the symbols of an unmarried girl’s marriage. When an unmarried girl wears a white dress, this symbol indicates the approaching date of her wedding. Hearing verses from the Holy Qur’an in a dream indicates the imminent marriage of the dreamer. In the dream of an unmarried young man or unmarried girl, she sees a change in bed linen, this is a symbol of the approaching marriage. One of the symbols of marriage soon is also the fortuneteller’s entry into heaven in a dream and the fortuneteller’s joy. See it Wearing new shoes in a dream is a symbol of marriage. Seeing the moon in her dream, as an unmarried girl, symbolizes her marriage to a person who has a high status in people and society. As for seeing a young man or girl who had never been married before and that they died, the vision symbolizes Their entry into married life. Seeing an unmarried young man in his dream about the sun symbolizes the approaching marriage. Symbols that indicate the imminence of marriage. Among the symbols explained by interpretive scholars is plowing the land and mowing it with water. Seeing an unmarried girl wearing a crown on her head in a dream. The vision symbolizes that time She is crowned with a good man who proposes to her. Seeing water in a dream is one of the promising symbols of upcoming marriage. Eating dates is one of the symbols of a happy marriage soon in the dream of an unmarried young man or girl. When the dreamer dreams that he is moving from his old home to a new home, the vision symbolizes To marriage. The gathering of the family and the entire family for a meal indicates the emergence of great joy in the neighborhood. Like marriage, you are the reason for the family gathering. When the dreamer sees the lion in a dream, the vision symbolizes the girl’s marriage to a young man of influence, status and power. If the fortuneteller or If the fortuneteller sees in a mirror in a dream, the vision symbolizes marriage. If the dreamer sees himself obtaining a travel visa, the vision symbolizes his farewell to the life of celibacy and entering married life. As for the fortune teller or the woman seeing that she is eating sweets in her dream, and it tastes delicious, this means marriage soon. Seeing a woman in a dream receiving a gift, the vision symbolizes her marriage soon. As for a man who sees a gift for a woman in his sleep, the vision symbolizes his marriage soon. If a person sees himself in a dream, he writes on white paper with red paint. That he will marry soon. I cooked food in the dream and it tasted good. The vision shows the marriage of the dreamer or the fortune teller. The dreamer walked in her dream towards a white tent. It symbolizes her approaching marriage. Seeing the same fortune teller shopping for a cup, the dream symbolizes the approaching of her marriage. See also: Interpretation of dreams for a man Married, marries again, symbols of marriage to someone else. There are many men in the country

title: Interpretation of seeing someone opening a window in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about someone opening a window in a dream via the roy2a.com website: Seeing the window shows the fulfillment of desires and dreams, a new job and marriage for the girl, as it indicates positive changes, and seeing the window closing shows failure and marital or family problems, and the unmarried young man and the divorced woman. And the widow, and providing interpretations of the great imams in interpreting dreams and visions, such as Imam Muhammad bin Shirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi and other interpreters in ancient and modern times. Ours on the Ruya website. What is the interpretation of seeing a person opening a window in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Seeing a window opening in a dream indicates the beginning of a new life, positive changes, hope, optimism and positivity, and a bright future. Seeing a young man opening a window in a dream indicates a new job and a promotion at work It may indicate buying a new car or apartment. Seeing a closed window for a married man in a dream indicates that he has left his job or left his wife. Seeing a broken window in a dream indicates not obtaining an academic degree, leaving work, or marital or family problems. Other related dreams Interpretation of seeing someone you love screaming at you in a dream. What does it mean to see someone? Someone opening a window in a dream for single people. Seeing an open window in a dream indicates the fulfillment of her dreams and desires in life. Seeing a glass window in a dream for a single girl indicates her marriage to a young man of good character. If the girl sees that there is someone Watching her from the window indicates the approach of her marriage or engagement. Other related dreams: Interpretation of seeing someone mocking you in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing someone opening a window in a dream for a married woman? If a married woman sees an open window in a dream, it indicates the satisfaction of her desires, her marital happiness, and the improvement of her financial situation. If a married woman sees a broken window while repairing it in a dream, it indicates the collapse of marital problems and disputes. Seeing a window falling in a dream indicates many problems and fears, and closing a window can indicate separation and divorce. What is the interpretation of seeing someone opening a window in a dream for a pregnant woman? A pregnant woman has an open window in a dream, and it indicates the collapse of problems, pain, and the imminent date of birth. If a pregnant woman sees a glass window in a dream, it indicates the approaching birth, the ease of childbirth, and her joy with the baby. Other related dreams: Interpretation of seeing someone giving me a black car in a dream. What is it? Interpretation of a dream that someone opens the window in a divorced woman’s dream? If a divorced woman sees that someone is watching her from the window in a dream, she announces her marriage again to whomever wishes. Seeing the open window in the final dream indicates the fulfillment of desires and the fulfillment of what is desired. What is the interpretation of a dream about someone watching me from the window? For a single woman? Seeing someone watching someone in a dream shows that the girl is in trouble because of this person and cannot get rid of him. Seeing someone watching from a girl’s window indicates that she will marry the person watching her or someone who looks like him. What is the interpretation of seeing someone spying on me in a dream? title: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a son to an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a boy for a single womanInterpretation of a dream about giving birth to a boy for a single woman What are the most accurate secrets of seeing the birth of a boy for a single girl? Does it affect the appearance of the boy who is born in the dream or not? What is the interpretation of seeing the birth of twin boys? The vision is full of accurate interpretations and you will learn about it through the following article. Do you have a confused dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a boy for a single woman. Seeing the birth of a boy in a dream for a single woman includes within it a number of sub-visions and dreams, and each dream has its own details, and based on these details, the appropriate meaning of the dream will be determined as follows: Seeing the birth of a child without seeing his face :It indicates bitter periods and difficult times that the dreamer will soon go through, but she will soon pass these difficulties in her life. Dreaming of the birth of an ugly boy: It indicates severe crises and problems that cannot be solved overnight, but it takes a lot of time and successive efforts to get the dreamer out. From it safely. Seeing the birth of twin boys: It indicates the widening scope of distress and difficulties that the dreamer is suffering from, and this vision is one of the worst that one sees in dreams, as it is interpreted by two serious problems that a single woman will soon face. Seeing the birth of a boy with a large body: It indicates an increase The amount of sadness and sorrow that awaits the dreamer soon. Seeing the birth of a boy and the occurrence of severe bleeding after birth: It indicates a major problem followed by painful losses in the dreamer’s life. Seeing the birth of a boy and his transformation into a girl: It indicates a change in circumstances in favor of the dreamer. After suffering through adversity and suffering, he will find that all difficult circumstances will disappear and turn into happy days and good news. Seeing the birth of a strange-looking boy with hair all over his body: This indicates the accumulated worries and burdens that afflict the dreamer, and he may suffer from financial hardship and a lot of debt in waking life. Dreaming of giving birth to a boy who resembles a snake or a scorpion: It is interpreted that the dreamer’s relatives will be the reason for increasing her pain and problems. The dream may indicate that the problem facing the dreamer will be complex and he needs to obtain the opinions of elderly and experienced people in order to be able to obtain them. To get out of this problem safely.Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a boy to an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin. When an unmarried woman gives birth to a boy in a dream, the scene depends on its meaning depending on the condition of the child, his shape, and whether his body is healthy or not? If an unmarried woman gives birth to a handsome, smiling, and cute boy in a dream, then the vision It symbolizes comfort, comfort, and freedom from worries. When an unmarried woman gives birth to her child in a dream without pain, she expects comfort from God and he will receive it soon, in addition to providing her with money, health, and a way out of hardships. But if an unmarried woman gives birth to a boy who resembles animals in a dream, the vision warns her Ibn Sirin said that it indicates many difficulties and problems. The most important interpretations of a dream about the birth of a boy for a single woman. I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy while I was single. If an unmarried woman sees that she has given birth

title: The 10 most important pieces of evidence for seeing fried eggs in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Everything you are looking to know by seeing fried eggs in a dream. Interpretation of seeing fried eggs in a dream. Many dreamers asked different questions about this vision and wanted to know its meaning in detail. Some commentators responded that fried eggs are benign symbols, but with conditions, and those conditions transform the vision from negative to positive and vice versa. He will learn about them in detail later. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Fried eggs in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about fried eggs has many meanings. If the dreamer feels very hungry in the dream and eats a plate full of fried eggs, then his needs will be met, and if he is thirsty for more money In fact, his physical condition would. Arise and be pious, and God will honor him with a lot of money. If the dreamer sees that he wants to eat fried eggs, he buys a lot of them, goes home and fries them, then sits down to eat them. The dream has symbols in order, all of which indicate important meanings, as follows: Or not: The symbol of the egg market is a sign of diligence in life and the pursuit of money and success at work. Second: As for the symbol of frying eggs, it means that the goal is approaching and that the dreamer reaches the material level that He wants or can reach one of his goals, not just the material goal. Third: Eating eggs is a sign that the dreamer will be able to do what he previously wanted and there will be no obstacles to achieving it. Fried eggs in a dream by Ibn Sirin. No interpretation of fried eggs was given in Ibn Sirin’s books. About the interpretation of dreams, but this scene will be interpreted by analogy. When the dreamer eats fried eggs with a familiar person and the two eat eggs from the same plate, this is evidence of a profitable partnership in business or a happy marriage, and the dream may indicate a lot of sustenance that God gives to both Both sides are at the same time. Fried eggs in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about fried eggs for a single woman symbolizes abundant goodness in her life and she prefers to fry eggs with white butter or ghee. Her life will be beautiful and full of means of pleasure and luxury. If she eats fried eggs with delicious white cheese and notices that the food is clean. It has no impurities, so if it is a worker, then the dream gives a pure blue color that is not contaminated with impurities that make it forbidden and bad. If the dreamer fries eggs and burns them, this means losing money, or in a clearer sense, she may be robbed or lose a large sum of her money in a business in the country. Reality. When an unmarried woman sees a table with fried eggs, cream, pure milk, a bunch of dates, and other foods that have a positive meaning in the dream, and she sees a handsome young man sitting at the table waiting to share the food, and she actually went to him and they started eating together, enjoying the beautiful taste of the food. This indicates the purity of her upcoming married life and the provision of a kind and cheerful husband who loves cooperation and participation in marital life. Eating fried eggs in a dream for a single woman. When an unmarried woman eats eggs and finds them full of salt, the food added

Third: Eating eggs is a sign that the dreamer will be able to do what he previously wanted and there will be no obstacles to achieving it. Fried eggs in a dream by Ibn Sirin. No interpretation of fried eggs was given in Ibn Sirin’s books. About the interpretation of dreams, but this scene will be interpreted by analogy. When the dreamer eats fried eggs with a familiar person and the two eat eggs from the same plate, this is evidence of a profitable partnership in business or a happy marriage, and the dream may indicate a lot of sustenance that God gives to both Both sides are at the same time. Fried eggs in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about fried eggs for a single woman symbolizes abundant goodness in her life and she prefers to fry eggs with white butter or ghee. Her life will be beautiful and full of means of pleasure and luxury. If she eats fried eggs with delicious white cheese and notices that the food is clean. It has no impurities, so if it is a worker, then the dream gives a pure blue color that is not contaminated with impurities that make it forbidden and bad. If the dreamer fries eggs and burns them, this means losing money, or in a clearer sense, she may be robbed or lose a large sum of her money in a business in the country. Reality. When an unmarried woman sees a table with fried eggs, cream, pure milk, a bunch of dates, and other foods that have a positive meaning in the dream, and she sees a handsome young man sitting at the table waiting to share the food, and she actually went to him and they started eating together, enjoying the beautiful taste of the food. This indicates the purity of her upcoming married life and the provision of a kind and cheerful husband who loves cooperation and participation in marital life.
